becker.robots
Class KarelFrame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--becker.robots.KarelFrame
Direct Known Subclasses:
CityFrame
Deprecated. "KarelFrame" has been renamed "CityFrame" as of 16-Sep-02.

public class KarelFrame
extends java.lang.Object

A KarelFrame displays a robot City and the Things it contains: Robots, Intersections, Walls, Lights, and so on.

Author:
Byron Weber Becker

KarelFrame

Construct a new KarelFrame which displays avenues 0 through 9 and streets 0 through 9.

Parameters:
model - The user interface's model (the city to display).

KarelFrame

                  int numVisibleAvenues,

KarelFrame

public KarelFrame(City model,
                  int firstVisibleAvenue,
                  int firstVisibleStreet,
                  int numVisibleAvenues,
                  int numVisibleStreets)
Deprecated. 
Construct a new KarelFrame which displays the intersection at avenue firstVisibleAvenue and street firstVisibleStreet in the upper left corner of the City. numVisibleAvenues avenues and numVisibleStreet streets are displayed below and to the right.

Parameters:
model - The user interface's model (the city to display).
numVisibleAvenues - The number of avenues to display
numVisibleStreets - The number of streets to display
